channel.title: process on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in process on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Labs - New Member Onboarding
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: New members joining our Labs team can be recommended either personally by an existing team member or through a development plan survey.

item.title: Labs - Topic proposal & progress tracking
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Selecting the right R&D topics is crucial for our organization’s growth. Currently, we are inviting topic proposals specifically from members of our labs, consulting and operation teams.

item.title: Labs x Consulting Workflow
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This workflow consolidates how new tech is introduced through the Labs team and how it gets processed to Consulting team to apply for projects and bring awareness of our tech expertise.

item.title: Reward Model & Nomination
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Our Tech Labs is a hub of continuous learning and application of advanced technologies. This program is designed to celebrate contributions at various levels, from enhancing knowledge to contributing to business growth.

item.title: Configure The Company Email
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Make sure you have 2FA enabled For this method to work, you need to have two factor authentification enabled for your Google account.

item.title: Making Decision As A Team Member
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Democracy in a Nutshell Sure we all heard of democracy. Mostly, this term appears in erhm, election? However, from what I understand, democracy is maintained by giving decision-making power to the people.

item.title: Adjust The Way We Work In Basecamp Style
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Being in a remote team is dope. Manage your own stuff, remove the time and cost of commuting, select your work ambiance, and got equipped with all types of supporting tools.

item.title: Ui Design Best Practices Dwarves
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: One of the factors that could make or break a project is the process of communication between designers and developers. Designers and developers have their own working “languages.

item.title: Qc Onboarding
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: General workflow Click on attached URL below to get more details about our general workflow: https://www.draw.io/?lightbox=1&highlight=0000ff&edit=_blank&layers=1&nav=1#G1jtKnGw5mpmGt31dFIoDOcGxVQrqxexF7 Access to testing resources After you have a permission on Team’s Google Drive.
